path: artifacts/SafeMoon Inu Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.SMI: contracts/SafeMoon Inu Full Smart Contract Security Audit/SMI

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions `includeAccount()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.
findings.location: Functions `includeAccount()` and `_getCurrentSupply` in the SafeMoon Inu contract.
